name: Space Game 1.0
description:
How to Play Goal

Get a high score &  life as long as Posible

 Flex with your Highscore

oh... mine is 789

Controlls

Arrow keys | WASD

turning counterclockwise

 turning clockwise

flying forward

nothing... theres no backwards 

Game Play

It's relatively easy.

In the top left, there's your Energie. It goes down over 

time and if you hit a Meteor you lose also Energie.

If you wanna gain Energie again you have to catch 

Energie Balls. just fly into them.
